f Profile Summary 
Accomplished professional with analytical, organizational and technical backgrounds in Data 
Processing & Application development. Ability to multi-task along with being adaptable and 
open to emerging technologies and challenges. Looking for an AS400/iSeries System Analyst 
position within the Sultanate of Oman. 
mSa.deshpandenavin@gmail.com | O+968- 94271611 |, Sultanate of Oman

6 Work Experience 
Al Hashar Group 
 
 
 
          since Apr’12
Analyst Programmer 
Al Hashar group consist of many companies which deals with different area of business 
such as Automotive, vehicle Leasing, Property brokerage, Engg. & construction, Veter Clinic 
etc. and posses various software’s for individual business areas. Following is the list of 
companies where I have provided my expertise & knowledge as Analyst Programmer.  
Al Hashar & Co. LLC. –In house developed ERP on iSeries. 
Skills & Tools: Prog.(RPGLE, SQL400, CLLE, OCL, RPG36), Tools (TARGET/400, SDA,RLU) 
 Converted S36 (OCL/RPG2) based applications to ILE (RPGLE) in order to give 
system flexibility for further enhancements. (3k+ Programs). 
 Converted Flat files to appropriate externally described files for structured data 
easy for data exploration & mining. 
  Created SUBFILES based UI’s to replace old Array based display files (DSPF36) for 
better functionality & scalability which significantly impacted our sales and 
inventory operations.  
 Designed and developed Impact Analysis Tool to provide suggested impacts on 
business application due to modifications in relative programs, which had greatly 
reduced the analysis & response time for any change request from stakeholders. 
 Played a Pivotal role during the migration of entire application from IBM iSeries to 
latest IBM POWER8 System. Assisted and documented the configuration details of 
new system (LPAR, Processor allocation, RAID drives, SST, DST tools), schedule 
jobs for backup & day end processes during the absence of our Database 
Administrator. 
 Empowered legacy application to sustain the taxation changes in Sultanate of 
Oman (Value added tax). 
o 
Represented ICT in VAT analytics seminar conducted by KPMG, Crowe 
Horwath to understand impact of VAT on Business. 
o 
Modified existing programs, UI’s, Reports to collect VAT from customers. 
o 
Tested the entire business application and deployed the application in 
Production with VAT @0 %. 
o 
Parameterized the Tax master file to flexibly adjust with VAT once it is  
rolled out In Oman. 
 Designed and developed Performance Monitoring System for Service module to 
analyze competency of technicians and falling in line with the Vendor specified 
global FRT. 
 Reengineered batch processing of day end activities to real time processing in 
order to access high value information on real time basis for on the fly analysis 
which earlier was not possible, as data was available on next working day only. 
 Empowered MIS system to project & forecast critical information to the 
management and corresponding team by sending email and SMS alerts. 
 Integrated SMS Country's Core Messaging Platform to send bulk promotional 
messages, MIS related alert’s to stakeholders, Notifications to customers for due 
service of vehicle etc. 

 
N A V I N    D E S H P A N D E  
mSa.deshpandenavin@gmail.com | O+968- 94271611 |, Sultanate of Oman
 Many other system modifications done in order to bring system in line with 
business process , such as PACP compliance, JV integration with Payroll System 
(Implex HRMS Accentia ©) 
   Al Muhannad Al Hashar LLC. – In house developed ERP on iSeries. 
   Skills & Tools: Prog.(RPGLE, SQL400, CLLE, OCL, RPG36), Tools (IDDU,SEU,SDA,RLU) 
   As the business started to expand, company required an ERP system to deal with various 
aspects of Business process. Instead of using the existing ERP of Al Hashar, we developed 
a better solution on iseries for the company which includes following modules: 
 Sales Module 
 After Sales Module 
 Inventory Control & Management Module 
 Finance Module  
 Reporting & MIS 
Entire Application is developed using ILE environment and PRINCE2© Project 
management methodology. The project was completed in 3 months time with limited 
resources. 
 
Al Hashar Equine Clinic - Vetter Software© 
The third party software is used in our Equine clinic to manage their day to day activities. 
 Taken demonstrations and acted as key person to understand the product and 
explain it to the team of doctors, finance staff and senior management. 
 Ensured proper training of software provided to the stakeholders. 
 During Implementation played pivotal role by understanding business 
requirements and explaining it to the team for making necessary and desired 
changes in Vetter Software©. 
 To ensure all the operational issues are logged in manage engine for resolution. 
 
 Engel & Voelkers – Salesforce© 
 Map salesforce.com hierarchy and territories in response to personnel changes. 
 Report and Dashboard Creation and Maintenance. 
 Data Quality, Migration and Maintenance. 
 Maintain System, Security and Integrity. 
 Create and Manage Changes to the Website. 
 
 Al Hashar & Co. LLC. – Implex© HRMS 
 Reengineered the existing software to streamline processes for HR functionalities. 
 Troubleshoot issues and provide functional support.  
 Intimate issue to the vendor using ManageEngine helpdesk and follow up till 
resolution. 
 Administer the payroll process by supervising the payroll team (ICT & HRAD) and  
        resolve any techo-functional issues. 
 Provide training to the stakeholders on the operations of Implex HRMS. 
 Backup and maintenance of the SQL database (Weekly/Monthly). 
 
Logicbag Infotech Solution Pvt. Ltd.           Jun’10-Apr’12 
Software Developer 
Skills & Tools: Prog.(RPGLE), Tools (SYNON2E,SDA,RLU) 
 
 Received 3 months rigorous training on AS/400 programming as an intern. 
 Worked on Project named Hitech 1.0 as entry level programmer. 
 Developed enquiry screens, payroll processing, Recruitment & assessment forms. 
 Leave And vacation module automation. 
 Payment voucher printings, Performance Appraisal forms and modules.
